The grid
Are you aware of or have you ever heard of an illness called Diabetes?
Have you ever had your blood sugar measured by a doctor or another health worker?
If YES to DAH2  Have you ever been told by a doctor or other health worker that you have high blood sugar or diabetes?
When were you told you have a high blood sugar?
IF YES to DAH3  In the past two weeks, have you taken any medication to lower your blood sugar?
IF YES to DAH3  In the last 12 months, have you gone to any health care provider to care for diabetes or high blood sugar?
Interviewer: I am now going to ask you a few questions related to your family’s history of diabetes.
Is any member of your family diagnosed with diabetes?
IF YES to IDR1  Which of your parents has /had diabetes?
IDRS CODE and SCORE (Family History): Neither parent…0 points
